history.summary: Enabled and customized a serverside-controlled A/B testing framework in Android WebView
highlights: Built an Android JobService to fetch regular data in background to optimize battery usage
Developed an Android Service to share large common data among WebView processes to reduce data usage
Designed the IPC protocol between WebViews and Service to keep them work independently
Updated the dashboard to visualize and aggregate event data for Android WebView platform

history.summary: Worked in OpenPublish Team to help build an automated solution for documentation publishing.
highlights: Designed and built a single-page application using AngularJS to track and manage documentation builds
Developed a tool to preview the documentation locally using C# and Mustache
Built the online log viewing feature and the corresponding RESTful API using AngualrJS and C#

projects.title: Millers Hollow Online
projects.summary: Best Project of Web Apps Dev
highlights: Created a website to play offline board game Werewolves of Miller's Hollow in the browser using Video calls
Developed a video communication mechanism with WebRTC to support 9 people playing the game together
Implemented a complete set of game logic with Vanilla JavaScript and real-time updates of UI with jQuery and WebSocket

projects.title: HackShanghai - Chrome Theatre
projects.summary: Rank 2nd/60 in the largest 24-hour Hackathon in China
highlights: Proposed a new way and a feasible solution to control online videos playing remotely using Android phones
Developed a Chrome extension with Reveal.js and AngularJS to organize videos into watchlists based on user interest
Built a WebSocket server in the Chrome extension to receive status from Android device through WebSocket

projects.title: RE2DFA Visualization
projects.summary: Built a handy tool to visualize the conversion process from Regular Expression(RE) to Minimized Deterministic Finite Automaton(min-DFA)
highlights: Implemented the algorithm in Python to generate NFA/DFA/min-DFA from basic Regular Expressions
Visualized the NFA/DFA/min-DFA as state machine diagrams in SVG with NetworkX and Graphviz
Developed a easy-to-use website with Django to let user interact with the process

history.title: M.S in Information Networking
history.summary: QPA: 3.69/4.0 TAs for Web Apps Dev and Advanced Cloud Computing
